title: Beaditive Sewing and Embroidery Scissors Set (2 Pc.) Curved and Straight, Sharp, Stainless-Steel Design | Precision Tips, Ergonomic Rubber Handle Grip | Small, Compact DIY Use (1 Curved, 1 Straight)
features: Multipurpose Sewing Scissors Set This unique kit includes green-handled scissors with a curved tip for embroidery and sewing, as well as pink-handled scissors ideal for fine details and general DIY use.

Rubber Handle Grips These sewing scissors feature rubber, ergonomic handles that are easier to handle, control, and manage while also helping to reduce finger and hand fatigue; important for bigger, in-depth projects.

Small, Compact, and Portable At just 4" in length these high-precision embroidery and sewing scissors are easy to keep in a crafting bag, with other DIY hobby tools, or even in the kitchen for quick, convenient access.
Precision Stainless-Steel Both pairs of our small embroidery scissors are crafted with heavy-duty steel construction thats rust and corrosion resistant and offers long-term durability and resilience.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
description: Product Description Design for People Who Love Handicraft, Even Professional Makers This Multipurpose Detail Scissors Set comprises a pair of scissors, has two different colors, designed for precise cutting tasks such as paper cutting, cutting for scrapbook, and other fine detail work. Straight Tip Pink-handled scissors with a straight tip are ideal for fine details and general DIY use. Curved Tip Green-handled scissors with a curved tip are for embroidery and sewing. Rubber Handle Grips Ergonomic handles that are easier to handle, control, and manage while also helping to reduce finger and hand fatigue . A Good Partner as You're Sewing These scissors allow for easy cutting of tight corners that other, clumsier scissors cannot handle.
